title: Window8.1怎么玩minecraft？
author: _hua_px
txt_content: RT，应用商店里没有此游戏怎么破？

replies.author: _hua_px
replies.txt_content:
chenle 发表于 2015-1-29 17:13
PE的么？
PE,PC二合一

replies.author: _hua_px
replies.txt_content:
卅个屮 发表于 2015-1-29 17:50
用桌面版玩
桌面版木有浏览器只有IE表示强迫症

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: xi7yang3
replies.txt_content: 我WIN8.1照样玩啊。。。。不要应用商店。。。。

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content:
在官网https://minecraft.net/购买游戏后下载。。。
不用到应用商店找- -

replies.author: w729945075
replies.txt_content: 想玩正版就去官网买，不想了就百度minecraft启动器，下载个启动器

replies.author: _hua_px
replies.txt_content:
